question: Lionesss, Only you and your Dr. can decide if diet and exercise will be enough for you  and this will come through trial and error. A lot depends on your A1C test....a measurement of your blood sugar levels over the last 3 months.Regarding your circulation in your arm you need to get this checked immediately. While diabetes can add to heart disease, the symptoms you describe need immediate attention.
title: A)To Lionesss
